授業目的: This course is designedThis for students who have completed Christianity A, in which they studied the fundamentals of Christianity, its history, the nature of the Bible, and some of the events of Jesus’ life. As a continuation of the previous semester’s work this course will look at Christianity in various contexts, and consider its influence on art, film, literature, and social movements.
到達目標: The goal of this course is to understand images of Jesus Christ in a broader sense by looking at it in relation to different disciplines.

第1回: Guidance 　the purpose and direction of the course.
第2回: Images of Jesus in European art.
第3回: Images of Jesus in Asian art.
第14回: Discussion and overall evaluation of the class.
トピック.授業外学習2: To read some verse of the Bible.
